name: The King Runner
description:
[ENG]

This game tries to overcome your own limit of skill and patience, you do not compete against anyone else, only against yourself and enjoy the music that plays in the background while your king has to dodge the obstacles to finally try to be with his beloved loneliness...

[ESP]

Este juego trata de superar tu propio limite de destreza y paciencia, no compites contra nadie mas solo contra ti mismo y disfrutar de la música que suena de fondo mientras tu rey tiene que esquivar los obstáculos para finalmente intentar estar con su amada soledad...

creator of all the elements of the game: Miguel Carrasco Lobo
